ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Modifies the resource group to which a cloud resource belongs.

ContinueDeployApplicationGroup.title: ContinueDeployApplicationGroup
ContinueDeployApplicationGroup.summary: Continues deploying an application group when an error occurs for calling the DeployApplicationGroup operation. You can call this operation only for the applications which reside in the China (Hangzhou) region. Use an endpoint of the China (Hangzhou) region.

CreateApplication.title: CreateApplication
CreateApplication.summary: Creates an application. You can call this operation only for the applications that reside in the China (Hangzhou) region. Use an endpoint of the China (Hangzhou) region.

CreateApplicationGroup.title: CreateApplicationGroup
CreateApplicationGroup.summary: Creates an application group. You can call this operation only for the application groups that reside in the China (Hangzhou) region. Use an endpoint of the China (Hangzhou) region.

CreateSecretParameter.title: CreateSecretParameter
CreateSecretParameter.summary: Creates an encryption parameter. Make sure that you have the permissions to call this operation.

DeleteApplication.title: DeleteApplication
DeleteApplication.summary: Deletes an application. You can call this operation only for the applications that reside in the China (Hangzhou) region. Use an endpoint of the China (Hangzhou) region.

DeleteApplicationGroup.title: DeleteApplicationGroup
DeleteApplicationGroup.summary: Deletes an application group. You can call this operation only for the application groups which reside in the China (Hangzhou) region. Use an endpoint of the China (Hangzhou) region.

DeleteSecretParameter.title: DeleteSecretParameter
DeleteSecretParameter.summary: Deletes an encryption parameter. Make sure that you have the permissions to call the DeleteSecret operation before you call this operation.

DeleteStateConfigurations.title: DeleteStateConfigurations
DeleteStateConfigurations.summary: Deletes multiple desired-state configurations at a time.

DeployApplicationGroup.title: DeployApplicationGroup
DeployApplicationGroup.summary: Deploys an application group. You can call this operation only for the applications which reside in the China (Hangzhou) region. Use an endpoint of the China (Hangzhou) region.

GenerateExecutionPolicy.title: GenerateExecutionPolicy
GenerateExecutionPolicy.summary: Queries the Resource Access Management (RAM) policy required for template execution.

GetApplication.title: GetApplication
GetApplication.summary: Queries the information of an application. You can call this operation only for the applications that reside in the China (Hangzhou) region. Use an endpoint of the China (Hangzhou) region.

GetApplicationGroup.title: GetApplicationGroup
GetApplicationGroup.summary: Queries the information about an application group. You can call this operation only for the application groups that reside in the China (Hangzhou) region. Use an endpoint of the China (Hangzhou) region.

GetExecutionTemplate.title: GetExecutionTemplate
GetExecutionTemplate.summary: Queries the information about the template of an execution, including the content of the template.

GetInventorySchema.title: GetInventorySchema
GetInventorySchema.summary: Queries the properties of a configuration list.

GetOpsItem.title: GetOpsItem
GetOpsItem.summary: Queries the details of an O\\\\\\&M item.

GetParameter.title: GetParameter
GetParameter.summary: Queries a common parameter and its value.

GetParameters.title: GetParameters
GetParameters.summary: Queries the information about one or more parameters.

GetParametersByPath.title: GetParametersByPath
GetParametersByPath.summary: Queries one or more parameters by path.

GetPatchBaseline.title: GetPatchBaseline
GetPatchBaseline.summary: Queries the information of a patch baseline.

GetSecretParameter.title: GetSecretParameter
GetSecretParameter.summary: Queries the information about an encryption parameter, including the parameter value. Make sure that you have the permissions to call the GetSecretValue operation before you call this operation.

GetSecretParameters.title: GetSecretParameters
GetSecretParameters.summary: Queries the information about one or more encryption parameters. Make sure that you have the permissions to call the GetSecretValue operation before you call this operation.

GetSecretParametersByPath.title: GetSecretParametersByPath
GetSecretParametersByPath.summary: Queries encryption parameters by path. Make sure that you have the permissions to call the GetSecretValue operation before you call this operation.

GetServiceSettings.title: GetServiceSettings
GetServiceSettings.summary: Queries the settings of the delivery feature.

GetTemplate.title: GetTemplate
GetTemplate.summary: Queries the information about a template, including the content of the template.

ListActions.title: ListActions
ListActions.summary: Queries the available actions, including atomic actions and cloud product actions.

ListApplicationGroups.title: ListApplicationGroups
ListApplicationGroups.summary: Queries a list of application groups. You can call this operation only for the application groups that reside in the China (Hangzhou) region. Use an endpoint of the China (Hangzhou) region.

ListApplications.title: ListApplications
ListApplications.summary: Queries a list of applications. You can call this operation only for the applications that reside in the China (Hangzhou) region. Use an endpoint of the China (Hangzhou) region.

ListExecutionLogs.title: ListExecutionLogs
ListExecutionLogs.summary: Queries the logs of an execution.

ListExecutionRiskyTasks.title: ListExecutionRiskyTasks
ListExecutionRiskyTasks.summary: Queries high-risk tasks in the execution of a template.

ListExecutions.title: ListExecutions
ListExecutions.summary: Queries executions. Multiple methods are supported to filter executions.

ListInstancePatchStates.title: ListInstancePatchStates
ListInstancePatchStates.summary: Queries the information about the patches of an instance.

ListInstancePatches.title: ListInstancePatches
ListInstancePatches.summary: Queries the information about the patches of an instance.

ListInventoryEntries.title: ListInventoryEntries
ListInventoryEntries.summary: Queries the configurations of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

ListParameterVersions.title: ListParameterVersions
ListParameterVersions.summary: Queries the versions of a common parameter.

ListParameters.title: ListParameters
ListParameters.summary: Queries common parameters. Multiple methods are supported to filter common parameters.

ListPatchBaselines.title: ListPatchBaselines
ListPatchBaselines.summary: Queries a list of patch baselines.

ListResourceExecutionStatus.title: ListResourceExecutionStatus
ListResourceExecutionStatus.summary: Queries the information about a scheduled execution that involves O\\\&M operations on Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

ListSecretParameterVersions.title: ListSecretParameterVersions
ListSecretParameterVersions.summary: Queries versions of an encryption parameter.

ListSecretParameters.title: ListSecretParameters
ListSecretParameters.summary: Queries common parameters. Multiple types of queries are supported.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to one or more resources.

ListTagValues.title: ListTagValues
ListTagValues.summary: Queries the values of created tags.

ListTaskExecutions.title: ListTaskExecutions
ListTaskExecutions.summary: Queries task executions. Multiple methods are supported to filter task executions.

ListTemplateVersions.title: ListTemplateVersions
ListTemplateVersions.summary: Queries a list of versions of a template.

ListTemplates.title: ListTemplates
ListTemplates.summary: Queries templates. Multiple methods are supported to filter templates.

NotifyExecution.title: NotifyExecution
NotifyExecution.summary: Notifies an execution in the Waiting state of the subsequent operations.

SearchInventory.title: SearchInventory
SearchInventory.summary: Queries the details or aggregate information of a configuration inventory.

SetServiceSettings.title: SetServiceSettings
SetServiceSettings.summary: Enables or disables the feature of delivering template execution records and sets the storage location.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds tags to one or more resources.

TriggerExecution.title: TriggerExecution
TriggerExecution.summary: Debugs a started execution that contains an event trigger task or alert trigger task. If the operation is called, a message body is sent to the event trigger task or alert trigger task. After the trigger task receives the message body, the trigger task generates a new child execution.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from one or more resources.

UpdateApplication.title: UpdateApplication
UpdateApplication.summary: Updates an application. You can call this operation only for the applications that reside in the China (Hangzhou) region. Use an endpoint of the China (Hangzhou) region.

UpdateApplicationGroup.title: UpdateApplicationGroup
UpdateApplicationGroup.summary: Updates the information of an application group. You can call this operation only for the application groups that reside in the China (Hangzhou) region. Use an endpoint of the China (Hangzhou) region.

UpdateTemplate.title: UpdateTemplate
UpdateTemplate.summary: Updates the information about an existing template.

ValidateTemplateContent.title: ValidateTemplateContent
ValidateTemplateContent.summary: Check whether a template is valid.
